blocks.name: bj-ssbeq
blocks.content: Substitution in an equality, disjoint variables case. Uses only ~ ax-1 through ~ ax-6 . It might be shorter to prove the result about composition of two substitutions and prove ~ bj-ssbeq first with a DV condition on ` x , t ` , and then in the general case. (Contributed by BJ, 22-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-ssbeq(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
} = {
  bitri(wsb(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))
  df-sb(s0, s1, hs0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  bitri(wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))
  albii(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
  imbi2i(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  bitri(wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wi(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
  19.23v(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  impbii(wi(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  ax6ev(s1, hs0)
  pm2.27(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  ax-1(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  bitri(wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wi(wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
  19.23v(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  impbii(wi(wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  ax6ev(hs0, s0)
  pm2.27(wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  ax-1(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s2), cv(s3))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-ssbeq(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ ([s0 / s1]s2 = s3 ↔ s2 = s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
} = {
  bitri([s0 / s1]s2 = s3, s2 = s3, ∀(hs0,(hs0 = s0 → ∀(s1,(s1 = hs0 → s2 = s3)))))
  df-sb(s0, s1, hs0, s2 = s3)
  bitri(∀(hs0,(hs0 = s0 → ∀(s1,(s1 = hs0 → s2 = s3)))), s2 = s3, ∀(hs0,(hs0 = s0 → s2 = s3)))
  albii(hs0, (hs0 = s0 → ∀(s1,(s1 = hs0 → s2 = s3))), (hs0 = s0 → s2 = s3))
  imbi2i(hs0 = s0, ∀(s1,(s1 = hs0 → s2 = s3)), s2 = s3)
  bitri(∀(s1,(s1 = hs0 → s2 = s3)), s2 = s3, (∃(s1, s1 = hs0)→ s2 = s3))
  19.23v(s1, s1 = hs0, s2 = s3)
  impbii((∃(s1, s1 = hs0)→ s2 = s3), s2 = s3)
  ax-mp(((∃(s1, s1 = hs0)→ s2 = s3)→ s2 = s3), ∃(s1, s1 = hs0))
  ax6ev(s1, hs0)
  pm2.27(∃(s1, s1 = hs0), s2 = s3)
  ax-1(s2 = s3, ∃(s1, s1 = hs0))
  bitri(∀(hs0,(hs0 = s0 → s2 = s3)), s2 = s3, (∃(hs0, hs0 = s0)→ s2 = s3))
  19.23v(hs0, hs0 = s0, s2 = s3)
  impbii((∃(hs0, hs0 = s0)→ s2 = s3), s2 = s3)
  ax-mp(((∃(hs0, hs0 = s0)→ s2 = s3)→ s2 = s3), ∃(hs0, hs0 = s0))
  ax6ev(hs0, s0)
  pm2.27(∃(hs0, hs0 = s0), s2 = s3)
  ax-1(s2 = s3, ∃(hs0, hs0 = s0))
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(s2 = s3)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s2, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: bj-ssblem1
blocks.content: A lemma for the definiens of ~ df-sb . An instance of ~ sp proved without it. Note: it has a common subproof with ~ sbjust . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-ssblem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), w0)))), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  spw(s0, hs0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), w0))), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), w0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0)))
  equequ1(s0, hs0, s1)
  albidv(s2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), w0), wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0)))
  equequ2(s0, hs0, s2)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wal.s(s0, s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0))
  diff.wi.s(s0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s2), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), w0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-ssblem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0,(s0 = s1 → ∀(s2,(s2 = s0 → w0))))→(s0 = s1 → ∀(s2,(s2 = s0 → w0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  spw(s0, hs0, (s0 = s1 → ∀(s2,(s2 = s0 → w0))), (hs0 = s1 → ∀(s2,(s2 = hs0 → w0))))
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, s0 = s1, ∀(s2,(s2 = s0 → w0)), hs0 = s1, ∀(s2,(s2 = hs0 → w0)))
  equequ1(s0, hs0, s1)
  albidv(s2, s0 = hs0, (s2 = s0 → w0), (s2 = hs0 → w0))
  imbi1d(s0 = hs0, s2 = s0, w0, s2 = hs0)
  equequ2(s0, hs0, s2)
  diff.wi.s(s0, hs0 = s1, ∀(s2,(s2 = hs0 → w0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wal.s(s0, s2, (s2 = hs0 → w0))
  diff.wi.s(s0, s2 = hs0, w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s2, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w((s0 = s1 → ∀(s2,(s2 = s0 → w0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: bj-ssblem2
blocks.content: An instance of ~ ax-11 proved without it. The converse may not be provable without ~ ax-11 (since using ~ alcomiw would require a DV on ` ph , x ` , which defeats the purpose). (Contributed by BJ, 22-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-ssblem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))), wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))), wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))), diffss(s0, s2))
  alcomiw(s0, s1, hs0, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))
  equequ1(s1, hs0, s2)
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  equequ2(s1, hs0, s0)
  diff.wi.s(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wi.s(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-ssblem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0, ∀(s1,(s1 = s2 →(s0 = s1 → w0))))→ ∀(s1, ∀(s0,(s1 = s2 →(s0 = s1 → w0)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((∀(s0, ∀(s1,(s1 = s2 →(s0 = s1 → w0))))→ ∀(s1, ∀(s0,(s1 = s2 →(s0 = s1 → w0))))), d(s0, s2))
  alcomiw(s0, s1, hs0, (s1 = s2 →(s0 = s1 → w0)), (hs0 = s2 →(s0 = hs0 → w0)))
  imbi12d(s1 = hs0, s1 = s2, (s0 = s1 → w0), hs0 = s2, (s0 = hs0 → w0))
  equequ1(s1, hs0, s2)
  imbi1d(s1 = hs0, s0 = s1, w0, s0 = hs0)
  equequ2(s1, hs0, s0)
  diff.wi.s(s1, hs0 = s2, (s0 = hs0 → w0))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wi.s(s1, s0 = hs0, w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w((s1 = s2 →(s0 = s1 → w0)))
}

blocks.name: bj-ax12v
blocks.content: A weaker form of ~ ax-12 and ~ ax12v , namely the generalization over ` x ` of the latter. In this statement, all occurrences of ` x ` are bound. (Contributed by BJ, 26-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-ax12
blocks.content: Remove a DV condition from ~ bj-ax12v (using core axioms only). (Contributed by BJ, 26-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-ax12(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  exlimiiv(hs0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  mpbii(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))))))
  bj-ax12v(s0, hs0, w0)
  albidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)))), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))
  albidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  equequ2(hs0, s1, s0)
  ax6ev(hs0, s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-ax12(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ∀(s0,(s0 = s1 →(w0 → ∀(s0,(s0 = s1 → w0)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  exlimiiv(hs0, ∀(s0,(s0 = s1 →(w0 → ∀(s0,(s0 = s1 → w0))))), hs0 = s1)
  mpbii(hs0 = s1, ∀(s0,(s0 = s1 →(w0 → ∀(s0,(s0 = s1 → w0))))), ∀(s0,(s0 = hs0 →(w0 → ∀(s0,(s0 = hs0 → w0))))))
  bj-ax12v(s0, hs0, w0)
  albidv(s0, hs0 = s1, (s0 = hs0 →(w0 → ∀(s0,(s0 = hs0 → w0)))), (s0 = s1 →(w0 → ∀(s0,(s0 = s1 → w0)))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = s1, s0 = hs0, (w0 → ∀(s0,(s0 = hs0 → w0))), s0 = s1, (w0 → ∀(s0,(s0 = s1 → w0))))
  imbi2d(hs0 = s1, w0, ∀(s0,(s0 = hs0 → w0)), ∀(s0,(s0 = s1 → w0)))
  albidv(s0, hs0 = s1, (s0 = hs0 → w0), (s0 = s1 → w0))
  imbi1d(hs0 = s1, s0 = hs0, w0, s0 = s1)
  equequ2(hs0, s1, s0)
  ax6ev(hs0, s1)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0,(s0 = s1 →(w0 → ∀(s0,(s0 = s1 → w0))))))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: bj-ax12ssb
blocks.content: The axiom ~ bj-ax12 expressed using substitution. (Contributed by BJ, 26-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-ax12ssb(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbir(wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, wsb(s0, s1, w0))), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w0, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))))
  mpbir(wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w0, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w0, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0))))))
  bj-ax12(s1, s0, w0)
  albii(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w0, wsb(s0, s1, w0))), wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w0, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)))))
  imbi2i(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w0, wsb(s0, s1, w0)), wi(w0, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0))))
  imbi2i(w0, wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)))
  sb6(s0, s1, w0)
  sb6(s0, s1, wi(w0, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: bj-19.41al
blocks.content: Special case of ~ 19.41 proved from Tarski, ~ ax-10 (modal5) and ~ hba1 (modal4). (Contributed by BJ, 29-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-equsexval
blocks.content: Special case of ~ equsexv proved from Tarski, ~ ax-10 (modal5) and ~ hba1 (modal4). (Contributed by BJ, 29-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-sb56
blocks.content: Proof of ~ sb56 from Tarski, ~ ax-10 (modal5) and ~ bj-ax12 . (Contributed by BJ, 29-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-ssbft
blocks.content: See ~ sbft . This proof is from Tarski's FOL together with ~ sp (and its dual). (Contributed by BJ, 22-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: bj-ssbid2
blocks.content: A special case of ~ sbequ2 . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: bj-ssbid2ALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ bj-ssbid2 , not using ~ sbequ2 . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-ssbid2ALT(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wsb(s0, s0, w0), w0)
} = {
  sylbi(wsb(s0, s0, w0), w0, wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)))))
  df-sb(s0, s0, hs0, w0)
  syl(wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)))), w0, wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))))
  alimi(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)))
  imim2i(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))
  sp(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))
  mpisyl(wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))), w0, wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), w0)), wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  alimi(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), w0))
  ja(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), w0))
  pm2.21(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), w0)
  imim1i(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  equcomi(hs0, s0)
  ax6ev(hs0, s0)
  biimpi(wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), w0)), wi(wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), w0))
  19.23v(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-ssbid2ALT(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ([s0 / s0]w0 → w0)
} = {
  sylbi([s0 / s0]w0, w0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 = s0 → ∀(s0,(s0 = hs0 → w0)))))
  df-sb(s0, s0, hs0, w0)
  syl(∀(hs0,(hs0 = s0 → ∀(s0,(s0 = hs0 → w0)))), w0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 = s0 →(s0 = hs0 → w0))))
  alimi(hs0, (hs0 = s0 → ∀(s0,(s0 = hs0 → w0))), (hs0 = s0 →(s0 = hs0 → w0)))
  imim2i(hs0 = s0, ∀(s0,(s0 = hs0 → w0)), (s0 = hs0 → w0))
  sp(s0, (s0 = hs0 → w0))
  mpisyl(∀(hs0,(hs0 = s0 →(s0 = hs0 → w0))), w0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 = s0 → w0)), ∃(hs0, hs0 = s0))
  alimi(hs0, (hs0 = s0 →(s0 = hs0 → w0)), (hs0 = s0 → w0))
  ja(hs0 = s0, (s0 = hs0 → w0), (hs0 = s0 → w0))
  pm2.21(hs0 = s0, w0)
  imim1i(s0 = hs0, w0, hs0 = s0)
  equcomi(hs0, s0)
  ax6ev(hs0, s0)
  biimpi(∀(hs0,(hs0 = s0 → w0)), (∃(hs0, hs0 = s0)→ w0))
  19.23v(hs0, hs0 = s0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: bj-ssbid1
blocks.content: A special case of ~ sbequ1 . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: bj-ssbid1ALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ bj-ssbid1 , not using ~ sbequ1 . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-ax6elem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ bj-ax6e . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-ax6elem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ bj-ax6e . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-ax6e
blocks.content: Proof of ~ ax6e (hence ~ ax6 ) from Tarski's system, ~ ax-c9 , ~ ax-c16 . Remark: ~ ax-6 is used only via its principal (unbundled) instance ~ ax6v . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-ax6e(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
} = {
  exlimiiv(hs0, wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  pm2.61i(wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  a1d(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  19.2(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  syl6(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  bj-ax6elem1(s0, s1, hs0)
  bj-ax6elem2(s0, s1, hs0)
  ax6evr(hs0, s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-ax6e(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  ⊢ ∃(s0, s0 = s1)
} = {
  exlimiiv(hs0, ∃(s0, s0 = s1), s1 = hs0)
  pm2.61i((s1 = hs0 → ∃(s0, s0 = s1)), ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  a1d(∀(s0, s0 = s1), s1 = hs0, ∃(s0, s0 = s1))
  19.2(s0, s0 = s1)
  syl6(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), s1 = hs0, ∃(s0, s0 = s1), ∀(s0, s1 = hs0))
  bj-ax6elem1(s0, s1, hs0)
  bj-ax6elem2(s0, s1, hs0)
  ax6evr(hs0, s1)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0, s0 = s1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
